entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
